messages.title: Time to raise the minimum wage
More Jobs
messages.content: Roberta believes in creating more jobs for the people in Durham.

messages.title: Supporting People
messages.content: Roberta has worked hard to ensure the vulnerable are supported.

messages.title: We must protect our NHS
messages.content: Roberta will work to protect the NHS from privatisation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Roberta believes in creating more jobs and supports a £8hr minimum wage.
Roberta will work to protect the NHS from privatisation and opposes government's market driven approach.

issues.economy: Roberta believes in creating more jobs and supports a £8hr minimum wage.
issues.health: Roberta will work to protect the NHS from privatisation and opposes government's market driven approach.
issues.socialWelfare: Roberta has worked hard to ensure the vulnerable are supported.

leaflet.personalStatement: Roberta believes in a fair society where everyone can do well.

politicalExperience.achievements: Roberta has worked hard to ensure that the vulnerable are supported.

quotes.text: I believe in a fair society where everyone can do well, not just those at the top.
